review.title: Rate US
review.description: How much you will rate our app?

info.term_of_use: The term '[business name]' or 'us' or 'we' refers to the owner of the website whose registered office is [address]. Our company registration number is [company registration number and place of registration]. The term 'you' refers to the user or viewer of our website.
info.privacy_policy: A cookie is a small computer file or piece of information that may be stored in your computer's hard drive when you visit our websites. We may use cookies to improve our website’s functionality and in some cases, to provide visitors with a customized online experience. Cookies are widely used and most web browsers are configured initially to accept cookies automatically. You may change your Internet browser settings to prevent your computer from accepting cookies or to notify you when you receive a cookie so that you may decline its acceptance. Please note, however, if you disable cookies, you may not experience optimal performance of our website.

items.title: WW2 Pack
items.description:
New World War II pack!

It includes:
63 characters:
- Africans
- Americans
- Brits
- Soviets
- Japanese
- Greeks
- Soldiers In Winter Camouflages
- 
Soldiers in Forest Camouflages
52+ different weapons:
- 17 working
- 30+ non-working
- 3 grenades
- 1 bomb
- 1 mine
- 6 edged weapons
Lots of Different scenery. 
Both military and natural scenery. 
Not all of the scenery is in the screenshot, and not all of the characters.

Notes:
- all characters are single-layered
- non-functional weapons will shoot with 
the "Parent" button
- the bushes are buggy, may not work
- some scenery will have to be enlarged and some scaled down.
- all helmets are bulletproof

items.title: Terraria's Murasama
items.description:

The open one has Glow.
If you want the sword to be a weapon and not a decoration and take it in your hand then shrink it.

items.title: Slime from Minecraft

items.description: A new version of the FNAF mod with the main characters from the game.

items.description: Mob known from the game Minecraft - Steve. Together with other mods on the theme of this game, it will be a great addition to your scenarios.

items.title: Pack on villains Pennywise Chucky Saw
items.description: Mod adds several famous characters from horror movies. There is a Chucky doll, the antagonist from the movie Jigsaw, the clown Pennywise and others. There are 15 characters in total in the pack + bonuses.

items.title: Steven Universe 2.0
items.description: Many of you know the cartoon Steven Universe, this mod contains characters and items on the theme of it. This is the second version which contains 11 items.

items.title: Anime girl
items.description: A simple anime girl mod. Who knows the name, write in the comments. Is it really worth it to make these modifications?

items.title: Iron Man - Tony Stark
items.description: The mod adds several variants of Tony Stark in the Iron Man suit. Great mod for creating a superhero card.

items.title: Jason and Freddy Krueger
items.description: The mod will add famous horror movie characters Jason and Freddy Krueger. Each of them has several variants of its kind.

items.title: Undertale Characters
items.description: Mod Undertale will add new characters from the game of the same name. There are 7 additions to the game in the archive.

items.title: Mario - characters
items.description: Will add three characters to the game Mario. In the future, it will probably be updated, getting new heroes and additions from the game.

items.title: Star Wars mod
items.description: Create a space map using the mod that was made for our site. It contains 20 Star Wars themed add-ons. There are main characters, lightsabers, Darth Vader and other familiar things.

items.title: SCP mod - monsters and anomaly
items.description: The topic of scp in games has always been interesting for its anomalous additions. This pack is dedicated to scp and contains 14 additions to Melon.

items.title: Steven Universe
items.description: The mod will add 6 characters known from the animated series Steven Universe.

items.title: Mod for children
items.description: The mod adds the children of the main Melon Playground characters and additional babies that will fit perfectly into the family map of the game.

items.title: Metal Family characters
items.description: The mod adds four main characters from the cartoon series Metal Family.

items.title: Red Amongus
items.description: The mod adds a character from the game Among As in red. Perhaps this is a traitor or an ordinary resident of your ship.

items.title: Nightmare animatronics
Squid Game - Characters
items.description: The mod will add three new characters related to the theme of the squid game. There is a guard, a doll and a participant.

items.title: Among As characters
Iron Man (Tony Stark)
items.description: The mod adds a couple of iron man suits and Tony Stark himself.

items.title: Characters from FNAF 9
items.description: The mod adds new characters that you are familiar with from the FNAF 9 game. In total, there are 12 heroes in the pack, a couple of which are not very stable and always fall when installed.

items.title: Characters from Dota 2
items.description: The mod adds 9 famous Dota2 game characters to Melon.

items.title: Fredbear's Family Diner Characters
items.description: Adds all characters from Fredbear's Family Diner to Melon. There are currently 13 heroes in total.

items.title: Big pack on the theme of FNAF
items.description: The mod contains many characters and animatronics from the FNAF game, which can be downloaded and used individually. After downloading the archive, it must be unpacked into the mods folder in the root of the game files.

items.title: The main characters of South Park
FNAF toys
items.description: The mod will add 4 plush toys known from the game fnaf. Any of them can be taken in hand.

items.title: Pack for many items from Minecraft
items.description:
Introduces the 2nd beta version of the mega pack of items from Minecraft for Melon. There are 72 add-ons in total, of which it is not recommended to take a block called “SFFONADA” during construction, because. it is very large and can destroy your starting building.

The pack has almost all the blocks, beams, interior items, torches, food, lane heroes and much more.

items.title: People Playground in Melon
items.description:
Many of the fans of Melon Playground played the PC version of the game (People Playground), so the mods from the pack will be familiar.

Author - Alexandr Melon created an android, a man, a gorse and a turret that you can use for your maps.

items.description: Adds the Soviet AK 47 assault rifle to the game. The size is 1 to 1, looks great in the hands, does not shoot.

items.title: WW2 pack
items.description: The mod is dedicated to the theme of World War 2 and includes a couple of tanks, a helicopter (off topic) and weapons.

items.title: Ice weapons Black Ice Bundle
items.description: Black Ice Bundle mod will add familiar small arms to the game. It can't shoot, but it has a cool look that will help when creating military-themed maps.

items.title: Weapons pack 6
items.description: The mod will add a small pack to firearms. A couple of guns will be familiar to you from the Roblox game. There are a total of 6 weapons in the pack.

items.title: Thompson gun
items.description: Adds the famous Thompson submachine gun, the favorite weapon of mid-60s American gangsters.

items.title: M16
items.description: The mod adds the M 16 rifle, which is probably a hundred times larger than the standard weapon. Think about how to use it and share in the comments what you think about this modification.

items.title: Huge War military
items.description: Mod dedicated to the theme of war from the author Alexandr Melon. The composition includes 14 add-ons, a couple of helicopters, several flags of states, helmets, a bunker, a barricade in the form of sandbags.

items.title: Weapon pack 5
Two hammers
items.description: The archive contains two files for hammer mods. One hammer has the inscription "BAN", the second without an inscription in gold color.

items.title: Bendy Axe
items.description: Beautiful Bendy ax from the game of the same name. Use as the main weapon of your heroes or as an interior decoration when building rooms and houses.

items.title: Starwars lightsaber
Glock Gun
items.description: The mod adds a large Glock pistol in a rainbow color, according to the author's idea, the pattern on the barrel should be in the form of fire, but he could not transfer the exact textures to the game, so what happened was what happened. It is slightly larger than the standard weapon in size, but it looks good.

items.title: 3 Knife
Thermo bomb
items.description: Download thermonuclear bomb to decorate your map. Use the mod to create a cool map that will look like military operations or a nuclear weapons depot.

items.title: Light
items.description: The mod is a light-tipped spear, a great addition to the Star Wars lightsaber mod.

items.title: Sword star wars
items.description: The mod adds a lightsaber from the Star Wars movie. After giving the sword to a person, you can change the color. Below is a video of the author, which demonstrates the work of the mod.

items.title: Terraria melee pack
GAZ Tiger - constructor
items.description:
Using this mod you have to assemble the Tiger from the constructor. The pack contains:

Basis GAZ Tiger
Wheel
Kenguryatnik
Seat
Spare wheel
It can be used just like an armored car and an SUV!

Peculiarities:

Flat hitboxes.
Nothing needs to be increased.

items.title: Air Defense
items.description:
Additions:

Turret gun
Turret base
projectile
Seat
In theory it shoots. Mount the cannon as shown on the cover. So that she can turn around.

items.title: Su-34 in different camouflages
Tank T-90
Katyusha
items.description: It adds the Soviet multiple launch rocket system - Katyusha. The author advises to use "resize".

items.title: KB-2
items.description: The mod adds a heavy tank KV 2 from World War 2. The author is indicated in the screenshot. Get it from the official discord.

items.title: Tank BT-7
items.description: Adds a light tank BT 7 familiar from the game WOT.

items.title: Pak theme of WWII
items.description: The mod is dedicated to the theme of World War 2 and includes a couple of tanks, a helicopter (off topic) and weapons.

items.title: M1 Abrams
items.description: Adds American tank M1 Abrams. Perfect for creating a tank battle themed map.

items.title: Leopard 2a7 - modern tank
items.description: Mod for a modern German tank Leopard 2a7. It is currently used as a layout in the game and cannot shoot and drive, but we hope that Melon Playground developers will implement this feature soon.

items.title: Military equipment (5 units)
items.description: Mod several units of military vehicles, 5 in total. There is a rocket launcher, a jeep, an old tank and a couple of armored personnel carriers.

items.title: War mod – Huge War military mudpack
items.description: Mod dedicated to the theme of war from the author Alexandr Melon. The composition includes 14 add-ons, a couple of helicopters, several flags of states, helmets, a bunker, a barricade in the form of sandbags.

items.title: T 64 BM - Soviet tank
items.description: T64 BM is a modernized version of the Soviet tank, which underwent changes in early 2003 in Ukraine. In the game, it has a view with an ammo rack and the ability to seat a tank crew.

items.title: Green tank
items.description: The mod adds a small tank. The tank cannot shoot and lead the crew, it serves as a decoration on the map dedicated to some event or a recreation of the battle for the state.

items.title: Tank KV-1
items.description: The mod adds the Soviet tank KV-1. Unfortunately, he cannot shoot, but with this tank, a new category opens in modding. We hope that soon the developers of Melon Playground will implement the possibility of creating shooting equipment and weapons as it is done on the PC version of the game (People Playground).

items.title: Helicopter Mi 24
items.description: Adds a combat Russian helicopter Mi 24 to the game. Great for creating a military map or air combat.

items.title: Fighter MiG
items.description: The mod will add the Soviet fighter of the 3rd generation Mig 21. The mod was created by the admin of the Fan Melon Playground telegram group.

items.title: Plastic planes
items.description:
A small package for airplanes. They are the same size, but with different colors, there is:

White
Blue
Violet
Red
Green
Orange
Yellow
Grey
Peculiarities:

Everything can be taken
Lots of different colors

items.title: Mi-28N (Night Hunter)
items.description:
The helicopter will be a great addition to the modern T-90 tank.

Has desert camouflage

items.title: Simple helicopter
items.description: The mod adds a regular transport helicopter, which is used for rescue operations and the transport of passengers.

items.title: Kids Pack
items.description:
Melon playground kids Pack 

• There are all characters
• Everyone has layers
• Have your own skeleton
• They can't stand on their feet, it's too early for them
• Cute

items.description:

• Can tear anyone

• Loves a bloody mess

have wings

Body;
Jaw.

items.title: Dinosaur skeleton
items.description: The Dinosaur Skeleton mod is similar to the Tyrannosaurus Rex. Perfect for any survival scenario or setting up a Jurassic World scene.

items.title: Cornobul - mutants, weapons, things
items.description: Cornobul – это мод включающий в себя 26 различных вещей, оружия и мутантов. Сделан на тему «Чернобыля».

items.title: SCP mod - monsters and anomaly
items.description: The topic of scp in games has always been interesting for its anomalous additions. This pack is dedicated to scp and contains 14 additions to Melon.

items.title: Undersea world
items.description: Mod on the theme of the marine underwater world with sharks, a protective capsule for a diver and underwater mines.

items.title: Cat statue
items.description: Every home should have a cat! Use this cat mod when decorating your home.

items.title: Van
items.description: Adds a van in which you can plant a watermelon, load it with various cargoes and send it to trade in another country.

items.title: GAZ Tiger - constructor
items.description:
Using this mod you have to assemble the Tiger from the constructor. The pack contains:

Basis GAZ Tiger
Wheel
Kenguryatnik
Seat
Spare wheel
It can be used just like an armored car and an SUV!

Peculiarities:

Flat hitboxes.
Nothing needs to be increased.

items.title: Police pack
items.description: Pack on a police theme with a helicopter, pistol, police and special vehicles.

items.title: Katyusha
items.description: It adds the Soviet multiple launch rocket system - Katyusha. The author advises to use "resize".

items.title: Truck with a trailer
items.description: The mod adds a truck with trailers in which you can load anything you want. The truck comes without wheels, you will need to install them yourself.

items.title: Big Russian mod 6!
items.description: 6 version of the Russian mod, which was replenished with new items, cars and other additions with which you can create a cool Russian location.

items.title: Pack of cars
items.description: The mod will add 10 different cars and a bonus weapon (SCAR) to Melon Playground. Cars of different classes and purposes, you can fill a pickup truck with pumpkins and crash into a wall or create a racing-themed map.

items.title: Survival V5 - 42 items
items.description:
The Survival V5 mod is the latest version of the survival mod. Here the author finalized some textures and improved the whole pack. There are many items that are necessary for survival in difficult conditions far from civilization. It contains 42 items in total.

The entire composition of the pack with Russian translation, the author also added one item that displays the author's name and the method of communication.

items.title: Vaz 2106 - eggplant
items.description: The mod adds the Soviet six (VAZ 2106) in the cool color "Eggplant". After installation, look for it in the section with swords.

items.title: Pixel Car Racing - racing cars
items.description:
The famous Soviet AKS-74 assault rifle with a folding iron stock.

Peculiarities:

You can take it in hand.
Flat hitboxes.
Doesn't shoot.
Glow only one.

items.title: Russian V5 - Russian mod
items.description: The Russian V5 mod contains a lot of things that are related to Russia. There is the Russian president, UAZ and Russian cars, a bottle of fire water, Navalny, grandmothers, herring, coins and more. There are 52 additions in total.

items.title: Mod for 3 civilians and 1 police car
items.description: Archive with 4 cars. One of them is a policeman, the rest look like racing ones.

items.title: Grocery store
items.description:
Pak includes:

Price tags: Weights, tea, rubber ring, kettle, plates, mugs, pumpkins, watermelon, apples and corn
Basket and trolley in which you can put items
Cash register
Scales that can be increased at will with resize

items.title: Multi-storey building
items.description:
Includes three items.

Installation recommendation:

Last floor - 1 piece
Middle floor - as much as you like
First floor - 1 pc.

items.title: Two-storey house
items.description: Adds a large two-story house to accommodate Melon residents. It is possible to change the size using "Resize".

items.title: Pack of different blocks
items.description: A large mod pack of different blocks to create cool scenarios in Melon. There are 16 items in total.

items.title: Cannon turret
items.description: Adds a structure in the form of a turret. Suitable for a roadblock or a military scenario theme.

items.title: Military things
items.description: Create a real military corner with control systems using this mod. The pack contains furniture and weapons. There are 13 items in total.

items.title: Grave stone
items.description: Adds a tombstone. There was already a similar mod, this one is its remake. Maybe someone will come in handy.

items.title: Decorative ventilation
items.description:
You can use it for decoration. So that the character does not hit his head on the ventilation, click on Enable Collision.

A screenshot of the vent burning with a watermelon is just a screenshot, it doesn't work in the mod unless the vent itself is set on fire.

items.title: Decorative pipe 2
items.description: Adds a decorative pipe that can be combined with similar modifications from the plumbing and construction section.

items.title: Blocks from Minecraft
Pipeline pipes
items.description: The mod adds 5 items with which you can create requirements of different sizes and positions. To fasten, use a pause and then fix with ropes.

items.title: Neon blocks
items.description: The mod adds 6 new neon blocks of different colors. Excellent materials for building an entertainment club or bar.

items.title: Bunker with additional things
items.description: Mod for the bunker, and many other things! It is able to decorate your game by introducing more approximate things into it, for the theme of war.

items.title: Fort - closed fortification with cannons
items.description: A fort is a stand-alone fortification with several cannons to protect the game lines. In the game, it cannot shoot (yet), but it will perfectly decorate the military map.

items.title: Pack of blocks
items.description: The mod adds a pack of blocks that will greatly help in the construction of various objects and maps.

items.title: Two-storey house with three rooms
items.description: The mod will add a small two-story house with three rooms. Initially, it is smaller than the game characters themselves, so change the size of the house in the settings (photo below).

items.title: Big house
items.description: The mod will add a large house size, which can be changed with the "resize" settings.

items.title: Laboratory
items.description: Experiment with people, do various studies using the liquid from the pack, diversify the gameplay with the laboratory mod.

items.title: Headstones
items.description: The mod adds elements of the grave using which you can make a creepy map.

items.title: Bedroom
items.description: The mod contains 10 items related to the bedroom.

items.title: School building
items.description: Add a school building to the game and use other mods to decorate the area around the building. The mod goes great with the characters from the animated series South Park.

items.title: Five-storey building
items.description: A five-story house with dynamic floors where you can install furniture and interior items. Great building to create a small town in the melon playground.

items.title: Street lights (lighting)
items.description: The street lights are blue in color and can light up when heated. An excellent lighting mod that will decorate the territory of the building in the form of a country house.

items.title: Moat
items.description: The mod will add a structure in the form of a moat or something similar, where there is water. The water here is visual and does not give a real effect if it were real.

items.title: Pack of home and office furniture
items.description: A large pack for furniture and various items that are suitable for decorating a house, apartment and office. There is everything you need for a good life of your game heroes.

items.title: Pack for many items
items.description:
Introduces the 2nd beta version of the mega pack of items from Minecraft for Melon. There are 72 add-ons in total, of which it is not recommended to take a block called “SFFONADA” during construction, because. it is very large and can destroy your starting building.

The pack has almost all the blocks, beams, interior items, torches, food, lane heroes and much more.

items.title: Survival V5
items.description:
The Survival V5 mod is the latest version of the survival mod. Here the author finalized some textures and improved the whole pack. There are many items that are necessary for survival in difficult conditions far from civilization. It contains 42 items in total.

The entire composition of the pack with Russian translation, the author also added one item that displays the author's name and the method of communication.

items.title: Pack of Minecraft blocks
items.description: A large mod pack on the theme of the Minecraft game, which will add a lot of blocks, food, torches and other interesting items to Melon with which you can make a cool map. In total, there are 45 items in the pack for today.

items.title: Statue of a soldier with a rifle
items.description: Use the statue of a soldier to recreate a war-themed map or honor the memory of military personnel involved in combat conflicts.

items.title: Items for video recording
items.description: The Movie Production mod contains the items needed to create TV shows or short cutscenes. The kit includes a chroma key, microphones, a video camera and more.

items.title: Tree without leaves
items.description: The tree mod is a small leafless tree, more suitable for decorating horror-themed maps.

items.title: Monument to the victory over the virus
items.description: The monument in the form of a soldier was dedicated to the victory over an unknown virus. Perfectly suitable as an interior map of a military theme.

items.title: Tiny Furniture
items.description:
Someone is already familiar with this mod, it has been updated and received version 4.0.

Fixed bugs in textures
Placed all items in separate categories (Kitchen/Bathroom/Bedroom)
Moved Room's to the "Building" tab
In the pack:

Bathroom
White Nightstand
Kettle
Chair
Coffee table
Fridge
Bed
Kitchen Cabinet
MacBook (Notebook)
Microwave
Mini wardrobe
Plate
Radio
Sink
Room
Cupboard
white wardrobe
Big wardrobe
Washing machine
Table
Bedside table
Television
Toilet
Bathroom
Wardrobe with seat

Red
Blue
Black
Green
All have a glow texture.

white box
purple box
lettuce box

items.title: Decorations for street and house
items.description: The pack contains 12 decor items with which you can decorate the living space and the street. Suitable for any scenario, especially on the theme of rest in the village with my grandmother.

items.title: Pack of school items
Decorative basket
items.description:
Adds a basket (you can't put anything in it), it can burn, and floats in water.

Works as a decor, can work in different scenarios.

Shower

items.title: Shelves
items.description: The mod will add shelves that are used as decor in your scenarios. They can be pierced with knives or swords.

items.title: Kitchen pack
BATHROOM MOD
items.description: The mod will add 14 items that you see every day in your bathroom and toilet. With this mod, you can create a fun script for Melon and for recording your videos.

items.title: Bunk bed
items.description: Maud add a bed in two floors. Also under the first bed visually there are additional drawers. Perfect for arranging a room in the game.

items.title: Computer desk and PC
Doors
items.description: Three doors: for the bathroom, closed and open. Good for building houses or decorating apartments in the game.

items.title: Gamer mod
Bed
items.description: The mod will add an excellent bed on which you can put a person to sleep. Use as additional furniture when arranging a house or apartment.

items.title: Household appliances and some furniture
items.description: The mod contains 21 items, most of which are various furniture and accessories, a lot of household appliances necessary for furnishing a house or apartment.

items.title: Items to create an office
items.description: With this mod, you can equip your office room. The mod contains 8 items.

items.title: Pack of home and office furniture
items.description: A large pack for furniture and various items that are suitable for decorating a house, apartment and office. There is everything you need for a good life of your game heroes.

items.title: Survival V5
items.description:
The Survival V5 mod is the latest version of the survival mod. Here the author finalized some textures and improved the whole pack. There are many items that are necessary for survival in difficult conditions far from civilization. It contains 42 items in total.

The entire composition of the pack with Russian translation, the author also added one item that displays the author's name and the method of communication.

items.title: Items for video recording
items.description: The Movie Production mod contains the items needed to create TV shows or short cutscenes. The kit includes a chroma key, microphones, a video camera and more.

items.title: Room furniture mod
Toy Mod​
items.description: A pack of toys for your melons.

items.title: Peebee mini-pack
items.description:
Mini pack for the unreleased cartoon "Peebee"

• Glitch puddle 
• A person infected with glitch

items.title: Barbell
items.description: Adds a sports equipment in the form of a barbell. It is very heavy and, if used incorrectly, can destroy a person.

items.title: Boxing mod
Basketball and hoop
items.description: The mod adds basketball paraphernalia to the game, namely the ball and the ring.

items.title: Ring mod
items.description: Используйте ринг для создания видосов или картинок на тему бокса или других единоборств в Мелон Плейграунд.
